item.title: [Delta] How do i remove this text? rep++
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

It’s fine. Just look at it as you’ve learnt something new, and next time you may be able to find what you are looking for yourself (i.e. if you get a message whilst attacking a npc, then think what to search for. You get experience for attacking a npc so if you search for that, the message you want removed must be near by).

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] How do i remove this text? rep++
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You just remove all the occurrences of a message being sent.

public void dealDamage(int amt) {
                currentHealth -= amt;
                if (currentHealth <= 0) {
                        currentHealth = 0;
                        deathStage = 1;
                        deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
                } else {

                }
        }

is this the right one? public void dealDamage(int amt) { ((Client) this).debug("Dealing " + amt + " damage to you (hp=" + currentHealth + ")"); currentHealth -= amt; if (currentHealth <= 0) { ((Client) this).debug("Triggering death timer"); currentHealth = 0; deathStage = 1; deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { /* * if(amt == 0){ if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == -1){ pEmote = * 404; } else { pEmote = 403; } } */ } } and should i remove it or what…?

item.title: [Delta] How do i remove this text? rep++
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You could of done that video in 10 seconds instead of 90 seconds lol. Go to where your server adds attack/strength/defence/hitpoints exp. and check for the message in there.

Otherwise it’ll be where your NpcFirstOptionPacket is handled.

I don’t know Delta.
